thread.title: VIDEO: Courtois scores unbelievable free kick in Chelsea training
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Courtois scores unbelievable free kick in Chelsea training

title: VIDEO: Courtois scores unbelievable free kick in Chelsea training
text:
â€” Thibaut Courtois (@thibautcourtois) January 9, 2017 
Courtois - who has kept a league-high 11 Premier League clean sheets for Chelsea so far this season - channelled his inner John Arne Riise as he smashed one in the top left-hand corner via the crossbar. 
The Blues are looking to get back to winning ways in the top flight on Saturday when they take on champions Leicester City. 
David Luiz is Chelsea's go-to man at set-pieces but don't be surprised to see Courtois putting his hand up if the opportunity arises at the King Power Stadium! Related
